outcomes.name: Animal Horn
outcomes.description: Brass with a rubber bulb. Can tinnily make the sound of any animal the wearer cares to name, possibly accurately enough to fool a very credulous animal.

outcomes.name: Enchanted Clock
outcomes.description: Keeps decent time. Clockface enchanted with moving pastoral, comical, historical, or moral scenes. Amoral evening scenes discreetly available.

outcomes.name: Pigeonpowder
outcomes.description: Spread outdoors summon, essentially, 50' cube of pigeons in 1d6 rounds. One use. Cloud disperses after 10 minutes.

outcomes.name: Iconograph
outcomes.description: Requires a special device (worth 200gp, requires special training). Black-and-white image marked onto paper. Can turn out blurry, distorted, or smeared. No refunds.

outcomes.name: Moving Picture
outcomes.description: Taken with a special device (worth 400gp, requires special training). A few seconds of movement in extremely blurry sepia. Smile and wave.

outcomes.name: Sheepgoggles
outcomes.description: While worn, every living thing looks like a sheep. Very difficult to tell people apart. Horses are big sheep, people are sheep on two legs, butterflies are flying sheep, etc.

outcomes.name: Wooden Fish
outcomes.description: Painted wooden segments. Wiggles realistically, swims in water. Fancy versions even bite hooks and nibble at food.

outcomes.name: Sparkwhistle
outcomes.description: Small, metal, shrill. Sprays harmless coloured sparks when blown. Enormous trumpetsized versions available. Tuba-sized whistles can blow a person’s hat off at 50 paces.

outcomes.name: Flutterpipe
outcomes.description: Hardwood pipe enchanted to turn smoke into birds, snakes, initials, faces, etc.

outcomes.name: Lively Puppet
outcomes.description: Fits over one hand. Has rolling eyes, dribbly lips, comical nose, etc. Can act semi-independently and make unintelligible noises.

outcomes.name: Enchanted Songbirds
outcomes.description: Polished tin or brass in a wire cage. Twitters, hops, sings. Cheaper than the real thing. Some people swear they can detect magical disasters before they happen.

outcomes.name: Speaking Mirror
outcomes.description: Pays vacuous mindless compliments to reflected faces. Every Season a new version comes out with more lines and responses.

outcomes.name: Malicious Gossip Cakes
outcomes.description: Contain a tiny paper scroll. 50% chance of a Rumour, 25% chance of nothing, 25% chance of gibberish.

outcomes.name: Permakitten
outcomes.description: Cat that’s perpetually tiny and irascible. Still a cat so it’s also disobedient and independent. Comes in a variety of unnatural colours.

outcomes.name: Prancing Statue
outcomes.description: Thumb-sized. Carved from stone or ivory. Ballet dancers prance, soldiers march, actors gesticulate, horses rear, etc.

outcomes.name: Enchanted Bell
outcomes.description: No matter how it’s rung, the bell automatically plays the next note of a popular tune. Can wildly swing it about and make it seem like you’re making music.

outcomes.name: Novelty Scab
outcomes.description: Grown in a jar. Falls off in a week or when vinegar is applied. Extraordinarily realistic.

outcomes.name: Penguin Tie
outcomes.description: Amusing party trick (rapidly grows tiresome). Press a black tie to be disguised, via illusion, as a large somber-looking Emperor Penguin for 1d10 minutes. One use.

outcomes.name: Portable Orchestra
outcomes.description: Simple wood keyboard with multiple add-in slots. Can play one instrument per slot. Tinny, distorted. Generally considered a nuisance.

outcomes.name: Prismatic Roses
outcomes.description: Roses in every shade of the rainbow and a few more found only on tropical frogs. Plaid, paisley, and checkerboard roses may also be available. Wilt in 4 days.
